extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VCSSqlModule(DBSettings dbSettings)
      this will create the sql module for vcs and the passed db settings and connect to the database

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finishImport()
      writes all pending changes to the database and closes the database connection after it
      List<Commit> getCommitsForIds(String project, String[] ids)
      get commits of the project that have the ids contained in the passed array

      searches commits from a project that matches the search parameters
      void importCommit(String commitId, String branch, String message, String author, Date creationDate)
      adds a statement to the batch queue to import a commit and branch with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the commits and branches each 500 statements that were added

      adds a statement to the batch queue to import a commit and branch with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the commits and branches each 500 statements that were added

      adds a statement for importing the diff represented by the parameters to a batch of such queries and executes the batch of sql queries for the diffs each 500 statements that were added

      prepares the sql module to import commits, if necessary tables are created

      • VCSSqlModule

        public VCSSqlModule(DBSettings dbSettings)
             throws SQLException
        this will create the sql module for vcs and the passed db settings and connect to the database
        Parameters:
        dbSettings - the settings for the database connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - if no connection to the database could be established

    • Method Detail

      • prepareCommitImport

        public void prepareCommitImport(String project)
                         throws SQLException
        prepares the sql module to import commits, if necessary tables are created
        Parameters:
        project - the project for which the sql module shall be prepared
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • prepareStmts

        public void prepareStmts(String project)
                  throws SQLException
        creates the prepared statements that will be used to import data
        Parameters:
        project - the project for which the data will be imported
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • recreateVcsTables

        public void recreateVcsTables(String project)
                       throws SQLException
        this will delete all tables of a project and recreates them
        Parameters:
        project - the project of which the tables shall be recreated
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • importCommit

        public void importCommit(String commitId,
                         String branch,
                         String message,
                         String author,
                         Date creationDate)
                  throws SQLException
        adds a statement to the batch queue to import a commit and branch with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the commits and branches each 500 statements that were added
        Parameters:
        commitId - the name of the commitId (eg. hash)
        branch - the name of the branch; if null no entry for the commit will be created in the branch list
        message - the commitId message
        author - the author of the commit
        creationDate - the date the commit was created
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • importCommit

        public void importCommit(String commitId,
                         String branch,
                         String message,
                         String author,
                         LocalDateTime creationDate)
                  throws SQLException
        adds a statement to the batch queue to import a commit and branch with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the commits and branches each 500 statements that were added
        Parameters:
        commitId - the name of the commitId (eg. hash)
        branch - the name of the branch; if null no entry for the commit will be created in the branch list
        message - the commitId message
        author - the author of the commit
        creationDate - the date the commit was created
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • importDiff

        public void importDiff(String newCommit,
                       String oldCommit,
                       int num,
                       String newName,
                       String oldName)
                throws SQLException
        adds a statement for importing the diff represented by the parameters to a batch of such queries and executes the batch of sql queries for the diffs each 500 statements that were added
        Parameters:
        newCommit - the id or hash of the newer revision
        oldCommit - the id or hash of the old revision
        num - the number of this change entry
        newName - new name of the file
        oldName - old name of the file
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • finishImport

        public void finishImport()
                  throws SQLException
        writes all pending changes to the database and closes the database connection after it
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • getCommitsForSearch

        public List<Commit> getCommitsForSearch(String project,
                                        VCSSearchParameters params)
                                 throws SQLException
        searches commits from a project that matches the search parameters
        Parameters:
        project - the project from which the commits shall be retrieved
        params - the parameters of the search
        Returns:
        a list of commits matching the searchparameters
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • getCommitsForIds

        public List<Commit> getCommitsForIds(String project,
                                     String[] ids)
        get commits of the project that have the ids contained in the passed array
        Parameters:
        project - the project from which the commits shall be retrieved
        ids - the ids of commits
        Returns:
        a list of commits that have the passed ids or null if an error occured
